GLDEPTHMASK(3G) GLDEPTHMASK(3G)

NAME

glDepthMask - enable or disable writing into the depth buffer

C SPECIFICATION

void glDepthMask( GLboolean flag ) 








PARAMETERS



  
flag

  
Specifies whether the depth buffer is enabled for writing. If flag
      is GL_FALSE, depth buffer writing is disabled. Otherwise, it is
      enabled. Initially, depth buffer writing is enabled.








DESCRIPTION

glDepthMask specifies whether the depth buffer is enabled for writing. If
  flag is GL_FALSE, depth buffer writing is disabled. Otherwise,
  it is enabled. Initially, depth buffer writing is enabled.





ERRORS

GL_INVALID_OPERATION is generated if glDepthMask is executed
  between the execution of glBegin and the corresponding execution of
  glEnd.





ASSOCIATED
  GETS

glGet with argument GL_DEPTH_WRITEMASK





SEE
  ALSO

glColorMask, glDepthFunc, glDepthRange, glIndexMask,
  glStencilMask
